Text:
Anyone had problems with this running? It starts up for me but I cannot progress past the language selection, no matter what button i press.  If I press the HOME button the screen responds to that...  using usbloader gx

Could this be a new protection or bad rip?
Had the same problem with several downloads of this game - any ideas ?

Be sure that the Nunchuck is connected before loading this game.
otherwise it freezes in the language menu
Just tried that bru2 and it works a treat - thanks - now I can stop making coasters

BayTSP is watching this torrent, just an FYI.

*cough* PeerGardian *cough*
Who are BayTSP, and more importantly. Who fuckin cares?

Anyone knows what helps me?

When I start the game I only get a green/black lines screen immediately?

Works great on NTSC 4.1U with neogamma [r9beta11]. Force NTSC in the options settings and you're good to go!

Thanks very kindly to the uploader!
